articles.title: Officials Plant Trees
articles.content:
Officials Plant Trees
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Working people and school youth and children across the country have turned out as one in the spring tree-planting campaign on the occasion of the tree-planting day.
					 On March 2, Juche 35 (1946) President Kim Il Sung, together with General Secretary Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk, mounted Moran Hill to unfold the far-reaching plan for turning the mountains of the country into a thick woodland through massive planting of trees by all the people with patriotism.
					
					 On the occasion of the day, trade union members planted trees and flower trees of good species at Moran Hill, school youth and children at the April 15 Children's Flower Garden, agricultural workers at the Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site and women's union members at the Arboretum of the Central Botanical Garden.
					
					 Senior party and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party and leading officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions joined the working people of different strata and school youth and children in planting trees.
					
					 Tree-planting was also conducted by the Ministry of Railways and in provinces, cities and counties on the same day.

articles.title: Members of UNICEF Plant Trees
articles.content:
Members of UNICEF Plant Trees
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Acting representative Kamrul Islam and members of the mission of the United Nations Children's Fund here Tuesday planted trees at the April 15 Children's Flower Garden on the occasion of the tree-planting day. 
					 They planted with much care Aronia trees in the place associated with the immortal history of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il who worked hard to turn the country into the beautiful and rich people's paradise in thick forests.

articles.title: Illustrated Book of Natural Monuments Issued
articles.content:
Illustrated Book of Natural Monuments Issued
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Korean Cultural Preservation Agency has published "Illustrated Book of Korean Natural Monuments" (vol. 3).
					 Before compiling the book researchers of the agency revalued the natural monuments throughout the country and renewed their registration while finding out more animals and plants that are of great academic significance. 
					
					 Through a nationwide survey they acquired the growing condition of natural monuments, actual situation of their protection and their geographical location and distribution and discovered their biological features. They also placed some animals and plants on the list of natural monuments.
					
					 The first two volumes deal with 266 plants in total and the third with 97 animals.
					
					 The third volume is divided into parts of vertebrates and invertebrates. It also deals with the newly registered animals such as char in Lake Chon (Salvelinus malma m. chonjiensis), Unio in the Taedong River, Maengsan otter and Rana coreana in Mt. Kuwol.
					
					 To promote the readers' understanding the book gives the names of plants and animals in five languages along with an illustration of each natural monument.
					
					 The book will help the readers have a better knowledge of natural monuments and contribute to protecting and propagating the national treasures.

articles.title: "Kanghwa Island Treaty" Forced by Japanese Invaders
articles.content:
"Kanghwa Island Treaty" Forced by Japanese Invaders
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- It is well known that the "Kanghwa Island Treaty" is an aggressive and inequitable one pressed by the Japanese invaders upon Korea 134 years ago.
					 The "Unyo-maru" Incident tells its illegality.
					
					 In September 1875, Japanese appeared in the sea off Kanghwa Island aboard a vessel, "Unyo-maru," to assault a battery on the island and then invaded Jongsan and Yongjong islands to set fire to the villages and rob houses of their properties.
					
					 Their infringement upon the sovereignty of the Korean nation was faced with due punishment by a Korean garrison.
					
					 Such being the case, the Japanese pirates, accusing the Korean side of "hostility," threatened by arms the Korean feudal rulers to compensate for the damage of the vessel and, moreover, accept the "Kanghwa Island Treaty" in February 1876.
					
					 The twelve-point treaty, the keynote of which is calling on the Korean side to open harbors for Japan and allow it to make a measurement of seas around Korea and a sea chart, has nothing to do with the will and interest of the Korean nation as it is aimed at political, economic and military occupation of Korea.
					
					 Availing themselves of the treaty, the Japanese imperialists began to thrust their aggressive claws deep into Korea. Finally they fabricated the Ulsa (1905) Five-point Treaty to totally occupy Korea and started a cruel colonial rule to subject the Korean nation to immeasurable sufferings and mishaps.
					
					 Nevertheless, Japan has the hardihood to talk about the "legality" of the "Kanghwa Island Treaty", alleging that it cast a beam of opening to a corner of closed Korea.
					
					 The allegation is nothing but a vicious distortion of history for embellishing and justifying its aggression on Korea.
					
					 With no amount of sophism can Japan veil the illegal and unreasonable nature of the gangster-like treaty.

articles.title: KCNA Denounces US-S. Korea Military Exercises
articles.content:
KCNA Denounces US-S. Korea Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The United States is going to stage together with the puppet army of south Korea large-scale joint military exercises codenamed Key Resolve and Foal Eagle from March 8.
					 They describe the exercises as "annual ones" and "defensive" in a bid to cover up the dangerous and grave nature of the war maneuvers but this is nothing but sheer sophism which can convince no one. 
					
					 The projected joint military exercises are nuclear war exercises aimed at mounting a preemptive attack on the DPRK to all intents and purposes.
					
					 The military doctrine of the U.S. is one of war calling for a preemptive attack and the U.S. and south Korean puppet armed forces' scenario for a war against the DPRK is a scenario for a nuclear war based on the provision of "extended deterrent".
					
					 All their military exercises are pursuant to the above-said war doctrine and scenario.
					
					 As a matter of fact, the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle have so far been staged according to the "OPLAN 5027", a scenario for an all-out war to occupy the DPRK by a preemptive attack. Last year the U.S. and the south Korean authorities worked out even a document on the provision of the "extended deterrent" presupposing the use of nukes against the DPRK in contingency.
					
					 They do not conceal the fact that "equipment, capability and manpower" will be mobilized in the said joint military exercises to the fullest extent. This, needless to say, means the involvement of even the nuclear war forces in the war maneuvers.
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that the U.S. is set to stage such nuclear war exercises at a time when the international community is growing more vocal than ever before calling for a settlement of the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Obviously this is a deliberate attempt to disturb peace on the peninsula and torpedo the process for its denuclearization.
					
					 The U.S. has always stood in the way of denuclearizing the Korean Peninsula, pursuing only a war to stifle the DPRK, not seeking a solution to the issue on the basis of respect for sovereignty in relations with the latter. 
					
					 It is open secret that the U.S. administration ruled by the Democratic Party attempted to provoke a war against the DPRK behind the curtain of denuclearization in the 1990s. 
					
					 The U.S. is still increasing the nuclear threat through such nuclear war exercises as Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, driving the process for the denuclearization of the peninsula to a collapse. 
					
					 The reality goes to prove that how urgent and crucial the conclusion of a peace treaty and the termination of the hostile relations are for finding a solution to the nuclear issue on the peninsula and how just the DPRK was when it took measures to have access to  nuclear deterrent to cope with U.S. constant military threat. 
					
					 The process for the denuclearization of the peninsula can never take even a step forward as long as the DPRK and the U.S. remain technically at a war and the latter's threat of a nuclear war against the DPRK remains.
					
					 Should the U.S. persist in its unrealistic moves to stifle the DPRK in disregard of its realistic proposal, this will only compel it to boost its nuclear deterrent and its delivery means.

articles.title: US Military Action Flayed
articles.content:
US Military Action Flayed
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is now claiming that the projected Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises that it stages every year are "annual exercises for defence" and it will open to the press some of the exercises. Such sophism is a trick to cover up the aggressive nature of the military exercises, which works on nobody.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes this in a signed commentary.
					
					 Like all the military exercises the U.S. has staged in south Korea every year, the above-said joint military exercises are intended to improve the preemptive attack capability for stifling the DPRK by force, the commentary points out, and says:
					
					 The U.S. is persistently pursing the hostile policy toward the DPRK, while handling the DPRK-U.S. relations in its criminal strategic interests.
					
					 That is why the DPRK is exposed to the constant military threat by the U.S. and the danger of war persists still now in the Korean Peninsula though over half a century has passed since the cease-fire there.
					
					 As long as the DPRK has self-defensive means to repel any aggression by foreign forces at one stroke, it has nothing to be afraid of such joint military exercises as Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					
					 There is no doubt that the DPRK will take tougher countermeasures if the enemies intensify their military confrontation with it.
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean bellicose forces persist in the anti-DPRK war exercises aimed to make a preemptive nuclear attack, this will compel the DPRK to build up its self-defensive nuclear deterrent and means of its delivery.
					
					 They would be well advised to drop at once their reckless hostile policy toward the DPRK, facing up to the reality.

articles.title: US Moves for Missile Shield Slashed
articles.content:
US Moves for Missile Shield Slashed
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the United States had a test of intercepting ballistic missile by use of ABL, which is a declaration of new missile and arms race, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a signed commentary.
					 This will add a new strong missile shield system to the U.S. nuclear means not only in the Asia-Pacific region but also in Europe and other regions, thus totally upsetting the balance of strategic arms and creating a complicated structure of confrontation and serious danger of war, it says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. missile defense system is aimed to reinforce its strategic capability for preemptive strike with new ultra-modern weapons and realize its ambition to dominate the world by the absolute military edge.
					
					 If the U.S. rounds off MD, a replica of the "Star Wars" project, China, Russia and other strategic rivals will have no other choice but to make themselves more dependent on nuclear arms. The U.S. imperialists seek in this to drag other big powers into arms race and lead them to bankruptcy by heavy burden.
					
					 By drawing as many countries as possible into MD, the U.S. intends to make them dependent on it militarily and tide over its economic crisis.
					
					 What cannot be overlooked is that the U.S. imperialists are talking about "threat" from the DPRK as a pretext for MD.
					
					 Their scheme for MD is just a product of the wild ambition to stifle the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					 Therefore, the DPRK has no choice but to take strong countermeasures including the war deterrent buildup.
					
					 It is the exercise of the right to legitimate self-defense for the DPRK to bolster up its war deterrent.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket in S. Korea Blasted
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK "Human Rights" Racket in S. Korea Blasted
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean ruling forces are now raising hue and cry over the nonexistent "human rights" issue in the DPRK. This is a shameful conduct of those who are mad about confrontation with fellow countrymen and a ridiculous behavior of the political charlatans not knowing what true human rights are.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 On Feb. 11 the clan of the south Korean "Grand National Party" passed through the "Committee for Foreign Affairs and Trade and Unification of the National Assembly" a "bill on human rights in the north", which calls for setting up a mechanism for "improvement of human rights in the north" and establishing "human rights foundation".
					
					 Last year the south Korean ruling forces unhesitatingly committed such provocation as co-proposing "the resolution on human rights issue in the DPRK" in international arena while zealously following the foreign forces in the strategic anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign.
					
					 Their repeated vicious anti-DPRK "human rights" racket is an unpardonable political provocation against the DPRK as it is the intentional and premeditated action designed to hinder the improved inter-Korean relations, quell the atmosphere of reconciliation and cooperation and escalate the confrontation between systems.
					
					 Citing data to disclose that the south Korean society under the dictatorship enforced under the signboard of "pragmatism" has been turned into the world's most horrible graveyard of human rights, the article further says:
					
					 The anti-DPRK "human rights" campaign conducted by the south Korean conservative group is a shameful political farce of the fascist dictators turning black into white.
					
					 This vicious smear campaign is no more than a trick to tarnish the image of the best socialist system of the DPRK and escalate the confrontation and divert elsewhere the focus of the south Korean people's hatred and wrath at the conservative group which revived the fascist dictatorial system.
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon those who dare provoke and insult its dignified system, the article concludes.

articles.title: People Called upon to Turn Out in Tree-planting
articles.content:
People Called upon to Turn Out in Tree-planting
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- All the people should turn out as one in spring tree-planting under the slogan "Let us further beautify our mountains and streams and native places!" and devote their patriotic passion to this drive to build the country into a socialist paradise of scenic beauty good to live in.
					 Leading newspapers Tuesday stress this in editorials carried on the occasion of the tree-planting day.
					
					 On March 2, Juche 35 (1946) President Kim Il Sung, together with leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk, mounted Moran Hill and gave precious teachings to spruce up the mountains and fields of the country. This was a significant event as it ushered in a new history of tree-planting in Korea, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea put forward the revolutionary policy for turning the whole country into a thick woodland and greenery by launching the forestation in a fresh way from the 2000s and has wisely led the drive for implementing it.
					
					In recent years the brisk tree-planting campaign has been conducted with the participation of all the people to make great progress in forestation and turn many towns and villages, factories and the countryside into a socialist fairyland. This is a precious fruition of the energetic leadership of
						 Kim Jong Il.
					
					 All the Party members and other working people should turn out and devote their patriotic mind to the spring tree-planting drive, thus bringing about a new turn in forestation this significant year.
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all the officials and working people to take an active part in this significant year's spring tree-planting drive and fully display their patriotic enthusiasm in the work to spruce up the mountains and fields of the country associated with the noble intention of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu more beautifully.

articles.title: Intensified Movement for Reunification Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Intensified Movement for Reunification Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued a statement on Feb. 25 on the occasion of the 15th anniversary of its formation, in which it called for intensifying the movement for national reunification.
					 The statement recalled that since its formation the organization has waged a dynamic movement for independence, democracy and reunification while strengthening the solidarity among compatriots in the south and the north and abroad.
					
					 It said the organization would intensify the actions for the reunification and prosperity of the nation this year that marks the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo and the 20th anniversary of the formation of Pomminryon.
					
					 The statement stressed that the organization would arouse the people of various circles to the reunification movement under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself" and, at the same time, boost the solidarity and alliance with all progressive forces in an effort to intensify the actions for implementing the south-north joint declaration.

articles.title: Cancellation of Redispatch Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Cancellation of Redispatch Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration in south Korea on Feb. 26 issued a statement titled "Totally cancel the plan for troop re-dispatch to Afghanistan."
					 Referring to the fact that the "motion calling for troop re-dispatch to Afghanistan" passed through the session of the "National Assembly" on Feb. 25, the statement charged that the "motion" unilaterally cleared by the group of the "Grand National Party" is a dangerous one driving the destiny of the people to a crisis.
					
					 Such conservative group as the GNP which does not hesitate to hurl troops into a war of aggression to meet the request of the U.S. is the group of lackeys steeped in the sycophancy towards the U.S. to the marrow of their bones, the statement noted, warning that the authorities will meet the strong resistance of the peace-loving people if they do not totally cancel the said plan.

articles.title: WFDY Supports DPRK People's Cause
articles.content:
WFDY Supports DPRK People's Cause
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the General Council of the World Federation of Democratic Youth (WFDY) held in Lebanon on Feb. 6 and 7 extended full support to the youth and other people of the DPRK in their just cause.
					 The meeting was attended by representatives of nearly 40 youth and student organizations from more than 30 countries including member organizations of the General Council of the WFDY.
					
					 A political statement adopted at the meeting said:
					
					 The WFDY extends firm solidarity to the Korean people in their efforts to bring about a new phase in the struggle for independent reunification by meeting all challenges of the anti-reunification forces and accelerating the grand nationwide march for reunification by the concerted efforts of the nation under the banner of the north-south joint declaration.
					
					 The WFDY calls upon its all member organizations and friendly organizations to conduct widespread international solidarity activities to see the Armistice Agreement replaced by a peace treaty and urge the withdrawal of the U.S. imperialist aggressor troops from south Korea and the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea this year marking the lapse of 60 years since the outbreak of the Korean War.
					
					 The 2010 action plan adopted at the meeting stressed the need to positively conduct activities supporting the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea on the occasions of the 10th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration, the lapse of 60 years since the outbreak of the Korean War, the 65th anniversary of the liberation of Korea, etc.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Russia
						
Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions were held in the cities of Vladivostok, Khabarovsk, Volokolamsk, Nakhodka and Partizansk in Russia between Feb. 5 and 28 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed in the venues of the exhibitions were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photos on their exploits, books and photos on the true picture of the DPRK and handicrafts representing the wisdom and skills of Koreans.
					
					 Speeches were made at the opening ceremonies of the exhibitions. 
					
					 A deputy governor of the Maritime Territorial Administration referred to fresh leaps forward and innovations being brought about by the DPRK in economic construction despite so complicated international situation under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, expressing belief that the Korean people would surely open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012.
					
					 The first deputy mayor of Volokolamsk City said the books, photos and handicrafts on display clearly indicate the successes made by the Korean people in socialist construction, expressing hope that cultural exchange with the DPRK would become more brisk in the future.
					
					 The mayors of Nakhodka, Partizansk, Pokino and Artyom praised Kim Jong Il for having victoriously led the drive of the army and people of the DPRK for building a thriving nation by making an endless journey for field guidance.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the opening ceremonies of the exhibitions in Vladivostok and Nakhodka.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, March 2 (KCNA) -- One day in February Juche 96 (2007) General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il gave officials instructions concerning the improvement of the people's dietary life, when he mentioned jangajji (soy-sauced sliced vegetables).
					 He told them that jangajji is one of the popular foodstuffs relished by the Koreans from olden times and that all the families of the country used to prepare it in the past, but the custom seems to be rare in recent years.
					
					 He went on to say if vegetables are processed in an industrial way to be supplied to people, it would help improve their dietary life and lighten their household burden.
					
					 He also said measures should be taken to produce kimchi, jangajji and other daily vegetable food at factories.
					
					 He then righted their idea of considering only such things as salt, soysauce and soybean paste to be essential foodstuffs, saying that jangajji should also been included in them.

articles.title: Cuadros del partido y el Estado participan en la plantacion de arbol
articles.content:
Cuadros del partido y el Estado participan en la plantacion de arbol
 Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ATCC) -- Con motivo del Dia de Reforestacion, los trabajadores, jovenes y ninos escolares de distintas localidades de Corea se sumaron unanimemente a la plantacion de arboles de la estacion primaveral.
					 El Presidente Kim Il Sung subio el 2 de marzo del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche a la colina Moran en compania del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk y presento ahi el gran proyecto de convertir los montes de la patria en bosques frondosos al plantar muchos arboles con la voluntad patriotica.
					
					 Este dia, los miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea plantaron los arboles de buena variedad y arbustos florales en la colina Moran.
					
					 Mientras tanto, los jovenes y ninos escolares, trabajadores agricolas y las miembros de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea lo hicieron en el Jardin de Flores de Ninos 15 de Abril, el Lugar de Interes Historico-Revolucionario de Mangyongdae y la almaciga del Jardin Botanico Nacional, respectivamente.
					
					 Participaron en esta actividad los cuadros del partido y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios directivos de las organizaciones de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, trabajadores de distintos sectores, jovenes y ninos escolares.
					
					 La siembra de arboles tuvo lugar tambien en el Ministerio del Ferrocarril, las provincias, ciudades y distritos.

articles.title: ATCC comenta ejercicios "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho"
articles.content:
ATCC comenta ejercicios "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho"
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ATCC) -- Estados Unidos planea desarrollar desde el 8 de marzo junto con los titeres surcoreanos los ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran envergadura "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho".
					 Ellos tratan de encubrir la peligrosidad y la gravedad de esos ejercicios calificandolos de "anuales" y "defensivos". Pero, esta sofisteria no podra enganar a nadie.
					
					 Esos ejercicios devienen sin duda los simulacros de guerra nuclear para dar el primer golpe a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					 La doctrina militar de EE.UU. es la de guerra basada en el ataque preventivo y el guion de la guerra para agredir a la RPDC elaborada por ese imperio y los titeres surcoreanos propone la guerra nuclear basada en el ofrecimiento del "disuasivo ampliado".
					
					 Todos los ejercicios militares de ellos se realizan segun esa doctrina y guion.
					
					 Realmente, los simulacros arriba mencionados se efectuan segun el "plan operacional 5027", guion de guerra total para ocupar a la RPDC mediante el ataque preventivo.
					
					  El ano pasado, EE.UU. y las autoridades surcoreanas elaboraron hasta el documento sobre el ofrecimiento del "disuasivo ampliado" que tiene como premisa el uso de las armas nucleares contra la RPDC en el tiempo de emergencia.
					
					Ellos ni siquiera ocultan el hecho de que en los "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" se movilizaran los "equipos, la capacidad y el personal de todas las esferas". Esto sugiere que seran incorporadas hasta las fuerzas belicas nucleares.
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que EE.UU. desarrolla esos alborotos de guerra nuclear justamente cuando se hace mas fuerte que nunca la demanda de la sociedad internacional sobre la solucion del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Esto deviene el comportamiento intencional para destruir la paz y obstaculizar la desnuclearizacion en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					A lo largo de la historia de relaciones con la RPDC, EE.UU. vino estorbando la desnuclearizacion persiguiendo la guerra para aplastar a la RPDC en lugar de solucionar el problema basado en el respeto a la soberania.
					
					Segun un secreto ya descifrado, en la decada de 1990, la administracion democrata de EE.UU. intentaba la guerra con la RPDC detras de la cortina de desnuclearizacion.
					
					Hasta la fecha, el imperio lleva al fracaso la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana incrementando la amenaza nuclear con los alborotos de guerra nuclear como "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho".
					
					La realidad demuestra claramente cuan apremiantes e importantes son la concertacion del convenio de paz y la eliminacion de las relaciones hostiles para resolver el problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y cuan justa es la medida adoptada por la RPDC para disponer del disuasivo nuclear frente a la creciente amenaza militar de EE.UU.
					
					Mientras que persista el estado de guerra y prosigan las maniobras de guerra nuclear de EE.UU. para aplastar a la RPDC, el proceso de desnuclearizacion no podra dar ni un paso adelante.
					
					Si EE.UU. recurre a las maniobras irrealistas para aplastar a la RPDC despreciando la propuesta realista de esta, la segunda se vera obligada a fortalecer mas el disuasivo nuclear y el medio de su transporte.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia sistema antimisiles que implanta EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia sistema antimisiles que implanta EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ATCC) -- Hace poco, Estados Unidos realizo la prueba de interceptar los misiles balisticos utilizando el laser de alta potencia lanzado desde el avion que lo tenia a bordo.
					En un comentario individual difundido en su edicion de este martes, el diario Rodong Sinmun lo califico de declaracion de nueva carrera armamentista, especialmente, la de misiles, y prosiguio:
					
					Esa prueba permitira proveer de un nuevo y potente sistema de misiles a los medios nucleares de EE.UU. en la region de Asia-Pacifico y Europa. 
					
					En este caso, se rompera gravemente el equilibrio de las armas estrategicas y se crearan la complicada estructura de enfrentamiento y un grave peligro de guerra. 
					
					El sistema antimisiles de EE.UU. es para elevar con nuevas armas sofisticadas la capacidad de ataque preventivo estrategico y realizar la ambicion de dominar el mundo con la absoluta supremacia militar. 
					
					 Cuando sea completado este sistema, China, Rusia y otros rivales estrategicos no tendran otro remedio que recurrir mas a las fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					 A traves del establecimiento del sistema antimisiles, nueva version de la "guerra de las galaxias", EE.UU. intenta involucrar a otras potencias en la carrera armamentista y llevarlas a la ruina por la excesiva carga consecuente de esa competencia. 
					
					 EE.UU. trata de introducir a cuantos mas paises posibles en el establecimiento del sistema antimisiles con el designio de subyugarlos en lo militar y salvar su economia nacional en la crisis.
					
					 Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que los imperialistas estadounidenses justifican esa maniobra pretextando la "amenaza" proveniente de la RPDC. 
					
					 Al contrario, el establecimiento del sistema antimisiles parte de la ambicion de aplastar a la RPDC con las fuerzas armadas.
					
					Por lo tanto, la RPDC se ve obligada a tomar fuertes contramedidas como el fortalecimiento del disuasivo de guerra, lo cual significa el ejercicio del derecho a la autodefensa.

articles.title: Periodicos llaman a la plantacion de arboles en primavera
articles.content:
Periodicos llaman a la plantacion de arboles en primavera
Pyongyang, 2 de marzo (ATCC) -- Los periodicos capitalinos insertaron este martes los editoriales dedicados al Dia de Reforestacion haciendo enfasis en que todo el pueblo debe dedicar su pasion patriotica participando unanimemente en la plantacion de arboles de la estacion primaveral bajo la consigna "!Hagamos mas hermosas nuestra naturaleza y nuestra tierra natal!" para convertir la patria en el pintoresco paraiso socialista.
					 El Presidente Kim Il Sung subio el 2 de marzo del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche a la colina Moran en compania del Dirigente Kim Jong Il y la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk y dio instrucciones preciosas de acondicionar hermosamente los montes y campo de la patria, lo cual fue un evento significativo que dio inicio a la nueva historia de reforestacion en Corea.
					
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun y prosigue:
					
					 El Partido del Trabajo de Corea presento la orientacion revolucionaria de convertir todo el pais en areas boscosas librando nuevamente la repoblacion forestal desde la decada de 2000 y conduce sabiamente la lucha por materializarla.
					
					En los ultimos anos, se logro gran avance en el citado trabajo al librarse energicamente la plantacion de arboles como campana masiva y numerosas ciudades, aldeas, fabricas y campo se convirtieron en los lugares pintorescos de aires socialistas. Todo esto es resultado precioso de la energica guia del Dirigente.
					
					 Todos los militantes del PTC y los trabajadores deben producir un nuevo cambio en la repoblacion forestal en este ano significativo al dar muestras de su patriotismo en la plantacion de arboles en primavera.
